> The ship was impaled on a sharp underwater =
volcano. Its main bay

had left the place

>=
 
> A volcanic eruption shook the area. The energon deposits encrusted

ong its rim exploded and boiled away, but not before a low magnitude
> surg=
e hit the ship. It was just enough.
> 
> The lone warrior, twice a hero, ha=
d been in stasis lock since the
> crash.  By now, he was covered in seaweed=
s and deep sea animals, then
> the surge shook him back to life. Pressure s=
hould have crushed him to
> ruins, but his was a transmetal 2 body, and not=

> by nature.
>

ter computing where he was, started

ot 2 was back.
